about.title: It's great to have you here, let me introduce myself...
paragraphs: I've always had a curious mind and a real passion for my work. Right now, I work as Data Engineer, but I like to see myself as a well-rounded enthusiast who simply loves everything about Design and Technology. Throughout my career journey, I've worn different hats – from graphic designer to data analyst and back-end developer.
In my free time, I tinker with things in two dimensions, and I'm a big fan of memes, cute cat gifs, and city builder games.

interests.title: So, here's what I enjoy working with:

de.title: Data Engineering
de.description: Efficient processing and analysis of large volumes of data.

cloud.title: Cloud Computing
cloud.description: Storage, manage and process data on remote servers.

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: Replacing manual tasks with automated systems.

geometry.title: Flat Geometry
geometry.description: Study of shapes and relationships in two-dimensional space.

nlp.title: Natural Language Processing
nlp.description: Understanding and manipulating human language by computers.

ml.title: Machine Learning
ml.description: Algorithms that enable machines to learn patterns and make decisions.

python.title: Python Development
python.description: Web programming and some fun side projects.

science.title: Scientific Method
science.description: The process of objectively establishing facts through testing and experimentation.

projects.title: Well, I've been called to do a thing or two:

items.title: Opportunity map for oil sales
items.description: A great case of cooperation and creativity in a challenging scenario.

items.title: Implementation of an analytics architecture on cloud
items.description: Serverless, scalable, and cost-optimized data pipelines. Data infrastructure as code.

items.title: Teachable image classifier
items.description: How I enabled the creation of a personalized image classification model as a product feature.

items.title: Python library for brazilian document validation at scale
items.description: Creating a Python library for document validation to use in data pipelines.

items.title: Content recommendations based on mental health
items.description: A case on how technology, when developed in collaboration with other fields of knowledge, can be a powerful tool for social impact.

items.title: Physical evolution report for patients
items.description: An experiment on improving the patient's user experience by tracking progress in physical conditions.
